thread.section_title: InsuranceHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InsuranceHub | insurancehub.com
thread.title: Richard Sims

author: Richard Sims
title: Richard Sims
text: InsuranceHub has been great for us! We have our liability, property, auto, and workers comp through them, and everyone has always been extremely helpful. My primary contact, Amelia Richardt, has repeatedly gone above and beyond whenever I have needed help of any kind. All I have to do is call or email, and I have everything I need. I would recommend this company to anyone.
